name: COVID19ICD10CMValueSetForCrohnsDisease
title: COVID19 ICD10CM Value Set for Crohn's Disease
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains terms related to Crohn's disease and is listed as a gastrointestinal/liver disease on the CDC SARS-CoV-2 hospitalization surveillance case report form.),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes Crohn's disease. Includes complications due to Crohn's disease (e.g., Abscess of intestine co-occurrent and due to Crohn's disease).),(Exclusion Criteria: )
